name: dice thing (aaron_s_likes_kitties)
description:
Play in fullscreen!

~ GAMEPLAY~

Destroy or flip as many tiles you can before you run out of valid moves.

- Landing on a destroyable tile  destroys a number of tiles in the direction moved, equal to the number that was landed on.

- If any tiles get destroyed, the tile landed on will get flipped into a safe tile that can be used to help you move around.

- If the maximum amount of tiles are destroyed from a move (e.g. 6 if landed on a 6), the last tile destroyed also becomes a safe tile.

- Teleporting will allow you to get out of a pickle. But be warned: Where you end up will be random. You could end up in an even worse spot.

~ CONTROLS ~

WASD / Arrow keys to move.

SPACE key to Teleport.

"G" to be asked to Forfeit.

"I" to play again (after losing).

"M" to mute music.

~ TROUBLESHOOTING ~

- Game may not work in Chrome without hardware acceleration.
